issue.title: GMTK jobs report "bad interpreter: Text file busy"

content.raw: Another option is to avoid opening the file containing the job command for writing if the file already exists. There is already a mechanism in Segway for job resubmission for odd machine/environment issues and I feel like this is a good case for it. Potentially avoiding a rewrite of the job file might avoid a "text file busy".
